subject: Attention
body:
Attention
Please Reconfirm Your Full Information
 for Delivery of Your ATM Card Value $1.5Millions United States Dollars from United Nations and World Bank Group (WBG) Compensation Fund.
YOUR(1) Full Name:============
YOUR(2) Occupation:===========
YOUR(3) Age:================
YOUR(4) Telephone Number:===========
YOUR(5) Address:==============
YOUR(6) Country;============
CONTACT
Thanks
Mr.William K Raymond
Email: 
dondgono@gmail.com
Director General

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello Raymond,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the delivery of an ATM card. I appreciate your attention and would like to gather more information before proceeding. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

1. What is the purpose of this ATM card? Is it a reward or a benefit from the United Nations and World Bank Group?
2. How did I become eligible for this card? Was there any specific criteria or selection process?
3. Can you explain how the funds on this card were accumulated? Are they part of a grant, donation, or investment?

I look forward to hearing back from you with these clarifications.

Best wishes,
Richard
